name: Gutenberg Blocks – Feature Box
author: Sumaiya Siddika

sections.description:
The Feature Box Block is a great way to show important key features in the Gutenberg editor. You can have large background image, with colorful content box to displayed your important information. With featured box block, you can display your featured image with beautiful info box and call to action button.

Plugin Key Features

  • Background Image size
  • Content positioning
  • Ability to add Title, Description and CTA
  • Spacing options
  • Separator Customization
  • Color and Typography options for each element of the block
  • Easy Call To Action
sections.installation:
Modern Way
1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
2. Search For “feature box”.
3. Install in 1-click

Old Way
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/feature-box directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

  • Initial Stable Release

0.1.0 – 04/05/2021

  • Initial Release
